00211 #define ZCL_DEFINE_KE_CLUSTER_SERVER(clattributes, clcommands)                \
00212   {                                                                           \
00213     .id = ZCL_KEY_ESTABLISHMENT_CLUSTER_ID,                                   \
00214     .options =                                                                \
00215     {                                                                         \
00216       .type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE,                                        \
00217       .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY,                           \
00218       .reserved = 0,                                                          \
00219     },                                                                        \
00220     .attributesAmount = ZCL_KE_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT,              \
00221     .attributes = (uint8_t *) clattributes,                                   \
00222     .commandsAmount = ZCL_KE_CLUSTER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT,                         \
00223     .commands = (uint8_t *) clcommands                                        \
00224   }
00225

00230     {                                                                         \

00298 
00306   struct PACK
00307   {
00308     ZCL_AttributeId_t   id;           
00309     uint8_t             type;         
00310     uint8_t             properties;   
00311     uint16_t            value;        
00312   } keyEstablishmentSuite;
00313 } ZCL_KEClusterServerAttributes_t;

00324

00336     uint8_t             properties;   
00337     uint16_t            value;        
00338   } keyEstablishmentSuite;

00345 /***************************************************************************/
00349 typedef struct PACK
00350 {
00354   uint16_t              keyEstablishmentSuite;
00359   uint8_t               ephemeralDataGenerateTime;
00364   uint8_t               confirmKeyGenerateTime;
00368   uint8_t               identify[48];
00369 } ZCL_InitiateKeyEstablishmentCommand_t;
00370 
00371 
00372 /***************************************************************************/
00376 typedef struct PACK
00377 {
00381   uint8_t               mac[16];
00382 } ZCL_ConfirmKeyCommand_t;
00383 
00384 
00385 typedef enum
00386 {
00387   //0x00 - Reserved
00388 
00392   ZCL_TKE_UNKNOWN_ISSUER_STATUS     = 0x01,
00396   ZCL_TKE_BAD_KEY_CONFIRM_STATUS    = 0x02,
00401   ZCL_TKE_BAD_MESSAGE_STATUS        = 0x03,
00405   ZCL_TKE_NO_RESOURCES_STATUS       = 0x04,
00409   ZCL_TKE_UNSUPPORTED_SUITE_STATUS  = 0x05,
00410 
00411   /*For internal use only*/
00412   ZCL_TKE_NO_STATUS                 = 0xff
00413   //0x06 - 0xFF - Reserved
00414 } ZCL_TKEStatus_t;
00415

00482   } initiateKeyEstablishmentResp;

00498   } ephemeralDataResp;
00499

00506   } confirmKeyDataReq;
